Topic.Title: A series of eBook gamebooks with the same plot throughout the series?

Posts.EditableText:
I don't think this has ever been done before and I thought about doing it myself.  I want to write an eBook series that is a CYOA style and it will be a series.  But unlike other CYOA eBook series you will have to start from Book 1 because the sequels will continue the story from where you left off.  At the end of each Book will be a code to use to continue off where you left off.
Also the choices will be links rather than turn to page 4, etc.
So what do you think?
Too big of an idea?
